channel.title: Docker on MetaDefine - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on MetaDefine - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Installing And Configuring Docker Community Edition(CE) On GNU/Linux
item.description: Docker is a open source container program that performs operating-system-level virtualization. Docker currently provides three products Enterprise Edition(EE)、Community Edition(CE) and Cloud. This article documents how to install and configure Docker CE in GNU/Linux.

item.title: 在GNU/Linux中安裝Docker CE（社區版）全記錄
item.description: Docker是一款開源的，提供Operating-system-level virtualization(操作系統級別的虛擬化的)容器(container)產品，可實現在軟件容器中自動部署應用。目前有Enterprise Edition(EE)、Community Edition(CE)、Cloud三個變種。本文記錄在GNU/Linux中安裝、配置Docker Engine的過程，並通過Shell Script實現。

item.title: Building Docker Private Registry With Self-signed Certificate
item.description: Docker是一款開源的，提供Operating-system-level virtualization(操作系統級別的虛擬化的)容器(container)產品，可實現在軟件容器中自動部署應用。本文主要記錄如何Docker的Registry創建私有倉庫，並通過自簽證書實現通過域名訪問私有倉庫。
